availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elbert W. Allison (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of David P. Allison and Mary Allison. Married to Nancy Jane Bugg Allison in Hickman County, Kentucky, on March 1, 1853. Father of Sarah Eudora Allison, Mollie Allison, Mary E. Allison, Eliza Belle Allison, David Allison, Ada F. Allison. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860. Farmer in Hickman County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 36A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 672.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Hays, p. 546.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Vernon County, Clear Creek, p. 547B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994039, Hickman County Marriages.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hickman County, KY, June 1863.
"Elbert W. 'Ebb' Allison (1831-1910)," Find A Grave, Memorial 67174643, accessed January 16, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67174643.
